description: I drastically changed my career path and taught myself to code in 2020. Before that I could be found tending, then managing craft cocktail bars in Paris, NYC, Montreal, St Barts, Monaco - and many other places; acquiring some invaluable skills that translate into my dedication to the quality of my work every day.
highlights: Ability to conceptualize and design projects and products, all the way to implementation and launch.
Team building and leading, including hiring and training.
Understanding of business needs, operational and financial management.
